Title: A Ghost Along the Mississippi
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Declan De Barra, Declan De Barra (executive story editor), Ashley Lyle (executive story editor), Bart Nickerson (executive story editor), Michael Russo (executive story editor), Carina Adly MacKenzie (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: Klaus declares war on his enemies. Hayley and Jack become Tristan's pawns.
